title: Sustainable synthesis of activated porous carbon from lignin for enhanced CO2 capture: a comparative study of physicochemical activation routes
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00305E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Himanshu Patel, Amar Mohanty, Manjusri Misra
A sustainable and readily available material, lignin protobind 2400, was upcycled to activated porous carbon (APC) compatible with post-combustion CO2 capture.
